original_text:
A false witness will not go unpunished,
    and he who breathes out lies will perish.
korean_text: 거짓 증인은 벌을 면하지 못할 것이요 거짓말을 뱉는 자는 망할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: A false witness will not go unpunished
sentences.korean_translation: 거짓 증인은 벌을 면하지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and he who breathes out lies will perish
